parameters.definition: Buying price of good i in month m
Indicator whether good i is a vegetable or not
Maximum refining capacity for vegetables per month
Maximum refining capacity for non-vegetables per month
Storage cost per unit per month
Maximum hardness of goods that can be processed
Minimum hardness of goods that can be processed
Initial amount of goods available for processing

description:
LP or MILP

What buying, storing and manufacturing policy should the company pursue in order to maximize profit?

{
    "buy_price": [[\param{BuyPrice} for i in 1,...,\param{I}] for m in 1,...,\param{M}],
    "sell_price": \param{SellPrice},
    "is_vegetable": [\param{IsVegetable} for i in 1,...,\param{I}],
    "max_vegetable_refining_per_month": \param{MaxVegRefiningPerMonth},
    "max_non_vegetable_refining_per_month": \param{MaxNonVegRefiningPerMonth},
    "storage_size": \param{StorageSize},
    "storage_cost": \param{StorageCost},
    "max_hardness": \param{MaxHardness},
    "min_hardness": \param{MinHardness},
    "hardness": [\param{Hardness} for i in 1,...,\param{I}],
    "init_amount": \param{InitialAmount},
    "min_usage": \param{MinUsage},
    "dependencies": [\param{Dependencies} for i in 1,...,\param{I}]
}
